item001.title: Moong Dal Cheela
item001.description: Protein-packed savory pancakes made from ground moong dal with onions, tomatoes, and spices. Significance: Excellent plant-based protein source with all essential amino acids. Supports muscle building, weight loss, and provides sustained energy throughout the morning.
item001.healthBenefit: High in protein (24g per 100g), low glycemic index, rich in folate and iron.
instructions: Drain the soaked moong dal and grind it with water to make a smooth batter
Transfer the batter to a bowl and add salt, turmeric powder, and cumin seeds
Mix in the chopped onions, tomatoes, green chilies, and coriander leaves
Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat and lightly grease it with oil
Pour a ladleful of batter onto the pan and spread it in a circular motion
Cook for 2-3 minutes until the bottom turns golden brown
Flip the cheela and cook the other side for another 2 minutes
Remove from pan and serve hot with green chutney or yogurt
